row._WebConfig:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-15" standalone="no"?><!DOCTYPE AB_VTR_NR [ <!ELEMENT AB_VTR_NR EMPTY > <!ATTLIST AB_VTR_NR BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "" > <!ATTLIST AB_VTR_NR PLAUSI CDATA "NNNN" > <!ATTLIST AB_VTR_NR SEPPL CDATA "EIWP" > <!ATTLIST AB_VTR_NR WERT CDATA "" >

row.process:
:INC JOBI.BBS.JOBPDEFAULTS !**********GeneratedText, Do Not Change********** :SET &pttyp# = SYS_ACT_PTTYP() !Eintragen der READ Befehle :BEGINREAD :IF &pttyp# = "D" : PRINT "", "Bei Start via GUI wird die Eingabe der Startzeit unterdrückt" :ELSE : READ &START#,,"START [JJJJ-MM-TT HH:MM:SS]",'',K :ENDIF :READ &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST#,,"UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST [JN]",'N',K :READ &BRIEFE_CTV#,,"BRIEFE_CTV [J/N]",'J',K :READ &VALUTA#,,"VALUTA [JJJJMMTT]",'',K :READ &MANDANTEN#,,"MANDANTEN [01,02,20,21,54]",'01,02',K :READ &KOLLEKTIVNUMMER#,,"KOLLEKTIVNUMMER [NNNN]",'-1',K :READ &AB_VTR_NR#,,"AB_VTR_NR [NNNN]",'',K :READ &BIS_VTR_NR#,,"BIS_VTR_NR [NNNN]",'',K :READ &PARALLEL#,,"PARALLEL [1..100]",'',K :READ &TRACE#,,"TRACE [J/N]",'N',K :READ &PROT_VTR_FILTER_GEN#,,"PROT_VTR_FILTER_GEN [OK/AUSSCHL/ERROR/NONE]",'AUSSCHL',K :READ &PROT_MSG_TYPE_GEN#,,"PROT_MSG_TYPE_GEN [INFO/WARN/ERROR/NONE]",'WARN',K :READ &PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL#,,"PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL [OK/AUSSCHL/ERROR/NONE]",'AUSSCHL',K :READ &PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL#,,"PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL [INFO/WARN/ERROR/NONE]",'WARN',K :READ &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA#,,"PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA [OK/AUSSCHL/ERROR/NONE]",'OK',K :READ &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA#,,"PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA [INFO/WARN/ERROR/NONE]",'INFO',K :READ &RUN_AUSLOESER#,,"RUN_AUSLOESER [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_GENERATOR#,,"RUN_GENERATOR [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_SELEKTIERER#,,"RUN_SELEKTIERER [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_BEARBEITER#,,"RUN_BEARBEITER [J/N]",'J',K :READ &PROT_VTR_FILTER_GEN_CTV#,,"PROT_VTR_FILTER_GEN_CTV [OK/AUSSCHL/ERROR/NONE]",'AUSSCHL',K :READ &PROT_MSG_TYPE_GEN_CTV#,,"PROT_MSG_TYPE_GEN_CTV [INFO/WARN/ERROR/NONE]",'WARN',K :READ &PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL_CTV#,,"PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL_CTV [OK/AUSSCHL/ERROR/NONE]",'AUSSCHL',K :READ &PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL_CTV#,,"PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL_CTV [INFO/WARN/ERROR/NONE]",'WARN',K :READ &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA_CTV#,,"PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA_CTV [OK/AUSSCHL/ERROR/NONE]",'OK',K :READ &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA_CTV#,,"PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA_CTV [INFO/WARN/ERROR/NONE]",'INFO',K :READ &RUN_AUSLOESER_CTV#,,"RUN_AUSLOESER_CTV [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_GENERATOR_CTV#,,"RUN_GENERATOR_CTV [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_SELEKTIERER_CTV#,,"RUN_SELEKTIERER_CTV [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_BEARBEITER_CTV#,,"RUN_BEARBEITER_CTV [J/N]",'J',K :ENDREAD
!Eintragen der PSET Befehle :PSET &START# = &START# :PSET &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# = &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# :PSET &BRIEFE_CTV# = &BRIEFE_CTV# :PSET &VALUTA# = &VALUTA# :PSET &MANDANTEN# = &MANDANTEN# :PSET &KOLLEKTIVNUMMER# = &KOLLEKTIVNUMMER# :PSET &AB_VTR_NR# = &AB_VTR_NR# :PSET &BIS_VTR_NR# = &BIS_VTR_NR# :PSET &PARALLEL# = &PARALLEL# :PSET &TRACE# = &TRACE# :PSET &PROT_VTR_FILTER_GEN# = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_GEN# :PSET &PROT_MSG_TYPE_GEN# = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_GEN# :PSET &PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL# = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL# :PSET &PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL# = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL# :PSET &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA# = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA# :PSET &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA# = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA# :PSET &RUN_AUSLOESER# = &RUN_AUSLOESER# :PSET &RUN_GENERATOR# = &RUN_GENERATOR# :PSET &RUN_SELEKTIERER# = &RUN_SELEKTIERER# :PSET &RUN_BEARBEITER# = &RUN_BEARBEITER# :PSET &PROT_VTR_FILTER_GEN_CTV# = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_GEN_CTV# :PSET &PROT_MSG_TYPE_GEN_CTV# = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_GEN_CTV# :PSET &PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL_CTV# = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL_CTV# :PSET &PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL_CTV# = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL_CTV# :PSET &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA_CTV# = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA_CTV# :PSET &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA_CTV# = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA_CTV# :PSET &RUN_AUSLOESER_CTV# = &RUN_AUSLOESER_CTV# :PSET &RUN_GENERATOR_CTV# = &RUN_GENERATOR_CTV# :PSET &RUN_SELEKTIERER_CTV# = &RUN_SELEKTIERER_CTV# :PSET &RUN_BEARBEITER_CTV# = &RUN_BEARBEITER_CTV# !**************End of GeneratedText************** ! :IF &VALUTA# = "" : SET &LAST_YEAR# = SUB_PERIOD("&DATUM_AM#","JJ;0001","JJJJMMTT") : PSET &VALUTA# = LAST_OF_PERIOD("&LAST_YEAR#","JJJJ","JJJJMMTT") !: PSET &VALUTA# = LAST_OF_PERIOD("&DATUM_AM#","JJJJ","JJJJMMTT") :ENDIF
:PSET &PARALLEL_DEFAULT# = GET_VAR("VARA.CONFIG_EBENE", "PARALLEL_DEFAULT") :IF &PARALLEL# = "" : PSET &PARALLEL# = "&PARALLEL_DEFAULT#" :ENDIF
